p.b: Important: Please read these instructions all the way through or you may not receive credit for completing the task.

problem.p: This is the individual portion of the math test. All we ask is that you make your best effort to respond to these math questions. You may use the calculator if you wish.
If you do not know the answer, it is okay to guess. If you leave too many answers blank, you may not receive full credit for completing the task.

checkboxgroup.label: Select the answer that matches
checkboxgroup.choice: I understand that I am expected to attempt all of the questions.
